original_title: Positivə - 40 anni di Hiv in Italia
overview: A journey by car to the sea among four strangers, all under 40, all HIV positive, to discover their lives and tell with their faces and hearts uncovered what it means to have HIV today, in an age that sees it possible to live with the virus and lead normal lives but which still sees infected people victims of an enormous social stigma.
title: Positivə - 40 anni di Hiv in Italia
